00046   namespace Math {

00048     // Forward declarations...
00049     template <typename T, class P, template<typename> class S>
00050     class Matrix;
00051 
00052     // Forward declarations (required for friend status) of conversion
00053     // functions...
00054     template<typename T, template<typename> class S>
00055     Matrix<T, RowMajor, S> reinterpretOrder(const Matrix<T, ColMajor,S>& );
00056 
00057     template<typename T, template<typename> class S>
00058     Matrix<T, ColMajor, S> reinterpretOrder(const Matrix<T, RowMajor,S>& );

00061 
00063 
00144     template<typename T, class OrderPolicy = ColMajor, template<typename> class StoragePolicy = SharedArray>
00145     class Matrix : public OrderPolicy, public StoragePolicy<T> {
00146     public:
00147 
00149       Matrix() : meta("") { }
00150 
00152 
00155       Matrix(T* p, const uint b, const uint a) : OrderPolicy(b, a),
00156                                                  StoragePolicy<T>(p, OrderPolicy::size()),
00157                                                  meta("") { }
00158 
00160       Matrix(const uint b, const uint a) : OrderPolicy(b, a),
00161                                            StoragePolicy<T>(OrderPolicy::size()),
00162                                            meta("") { }
00163 
00165       Matrix<T,OrderPolicy,StoragePolicy> copy(void) const {
00166         Matrix<T,OrderPolicy,StoragePolicy> M(OrderPolicy::m, OrderPolicy::n);
00167         M.copyData(*this);
00168 
00169         return(M);
00170       }
00171 
00172       uint rows(void) const { return(OrderPolicy::m); }
00173       uint cols(void) const { return(OrderPolicy::n); }
00174 
00176       T& operator()(const uint y, const uint x) {
00177         ulong i = OrderPolicy::index(y,x);
00178         return(StoragePolicy<T>::operator[](i));
00179       }
00180 
00181       const T& operator()(const uint y, const uint x) const {
00182         ulong i = OrderPolicy::index(y,x);
00183         return(StoragePolicy<T>::operator[](i));
00184       }
00185 
00186       void metaData(const std::string& s) { meta = s; }
00187       std::string metaData(void) const { return(meta); }
00188 
00190       void reset(void) { OrderPolicy::setSize(0,0); StoragePolicy<T>::reset(); }
00191 
00192 
00194       friend Matrix<T, RowMajor, StoragePolicy> reinterpretOrder<>(const Matrix<T,ColMajor,StoragePolicy>&);
00195 
00197       friend Matrix<T, ColMajor, StoragePolicy> reinterpretOrder<>(const Matrix<T,RowMajor,StoragePolicy>&);
00198 
00199     private:
00200       std::string meta;
00201   
00202     };
00203 
00204 
00205     template<typename T, class P, template<typename> class S>
00206     std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& os, const Matrix<T,P,S>& M) {
00207     
00208       uint m = M.rows();
00209       uint n = M.cols();
00210       os << boost::format("# %d %d (0)\n") % m % n;
00211       for (uint j=0; j<m; ++j) {
00212         for (uint i=0; i<n; ++i)
00213           os << M(j, i) << " ";
00214         os << std::endl;
00215       }
00216       return(os);
00217     }
00218 
00219   }
00220 
00221 
00222 }
00223 
00224 #endif
